location.description: Very accessible to public transport with three national rail stations within 1-mile radius and the Elizabeth line from Abby wood station is just a 10-minute drive. The nearest grocery stores are Aldi, Lidl, Asda and Sainsburys, all within a mile radius. We live on a quiet road which is very safe and crime-free. There are lots of parks, pubs, and restaurants around.

house.description: House with a driveway and two sides facing a garden. Quiet and safe neighborhood.

pets.name: Shoni (Kazuya)
pets.description: Likes to keep to himself, plays with Lizzie

pets.name: Lizzie
pets.description: Loves to play fetch, very active

pets.name: Milli
pets.description: Chilled kitty, likes to stay in your vicinity, loves to play prey catching game

needs.food: wet food twice daily + treats three times daily

next.note: Owners will be present on 22nd to introduce pets and routine

feedback: The two Pom Poms were so kind and playful. Lizzie loves her ball game and Shoni is more reserved but equally lovely.
The location is absolutely fantastic with everything you need within walking distance.
Shoni and Lizzy are pomeranians that don't disappoint! Full of confidence and personality.
Milli is a curious sweetheart always seeking the attention of her pomeranian siblings.
